item.title: Interesting Software
item.description: This post is a running list of some software projects I want to look into more or have found useful in the paste.

item.title: Interesting Algorithms / Concepts
item.description: This post will just be a running collection of useful algorithms / concepts I want to remember.

item.title: Interesting Papers and Books
item.description: Navigation and Kalman Filtering Kalman Filtering Book: Principles of GNSS, Inertial, and Multisensor Integrated Navigation Systems Book: Advanced Kalman Filtering, Least-Squares and Modeling: A Practical Handbook Book: Stochastic Models, Estimation and Control: Volume 1 Inertial Sensors IMU Error State Modeling for State Estimation and Sensor Calibration: A Tutorial Rotation Formalisms Quaternion kinematics for error-state Kalman filter Attitude Error Representations for Kalman Filtering On the rotation vector differential equation Visual navigation Keyframe-Base Visual-Inertial Odometry Using Nonlinear Optimization High-Precision, Consistent EKF-based Visual-Inertial Odometry Lie Theory in Estimation A micro Lie theory for state estimation in robotics More general Math Lie Theory Book: Naive Lie Theory
